subject: RE: [junit] How can I get Junit Test to run in parallel threads?
msgSnippet: On Wed, 2002-10-02 at 16:25, Michael Silverstein wrote: We have a product called Enhanced JUnit (hence my interest in JUnit extensibility issues) that (among
messageBody:
On Wed, 2002-10-02 at 16:25, Michael Silverstein wrote:

We have a product called 'Enhanced JUnit' (hence my interest in JUnit
extensibility issues) that (among other things) will disburse JUnit tests
across threads, VMs, and CPUs for concurrent execution.

http://www.silvermark.com/Product/enhancedjunit/

Not to start a flame war... but why don't you follow Beck&Gamma's
example and give it to the JUnit community as so many others have done
with their extensions?

Dave

________________________________________________________________________
Dave Astels
Coauthor of "A Practical Guide to XP"
Editor of the Test-Driven Development Edition of The Coad Letter
CEO & Master Software Craftsman

An Agile Software Studio
